title: Le Vespe Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers several vegan choices such as house-made granola with fresh fruit and soy or rice milk, tofu scramble with roast potatoes and salad, rice spring rolls with marinated tempeh, steamed kale and shredded beets, sundried tomato sandwich with roasted red peppers and avocado.
